full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts P.O. Box 330 No. Quincy, MA 02171-9199 1-800-822-2700 October 15, 1986 Gerald D. Wall RE: Rose Garcon Petit Greater Boston Legal Services Cert. #6371463 68 Essex St. Boston, MA 02111 Dear Mr. Wall: We received your correspondence concerning Rose Garcon Petit's health insurance coverage. A_Blue Cross Blue Shield policy was established for Rose Garcon Petit effective on July 25, 1986. As indicated in the Blue Cross Blue Shield subscriber certificates, Ms. Petit's coverage in a participating general hospital, cooperating chron- ic disease hospital, a cooperating mental hospital, the semi-private room and board charge is paid at an 80% rate. Special services for such stays are paid in full as described on pages 4 through 8 of the Blue Cross certificate. Blue Shield pays 80% of the usual and customary charge for the covered services of a participating physician, as outlined on pages 3 and 5 through 8. Under Extended Benefits, Blue Cross Blue Shield reimburses the subscrib- er for reasonable charge for doctor's visits and prescription drugs. There is a $100.00 deductible per member for such charges on a calendar year, after which the reimbursement is paid at 80% That is outlined on pages 3 and 4 of the Major Medical certificate. For your convenience Blue Cross and Blue Shield provides walk-in service at the following locations: Downtown Boston Berkshires North Shore Southeastern Massachusetts Central Massachusetts 100 Summer Street 279 Dalton Avenue 50 Salem Street 175 Elm Street 43 Harvard Street Boston, MA 02110 Pittsfield, MA 01201 Lynnfield, MA 01940 New Bedford, MA 02740 Worcester, MA 01609 Metro West Greater Brockton Northeastern Massachusetts Western Massachusetts Telecommunications Device One Moody Street 10 North Pearl Street 820A Turnpike Street 77 Boylston Street for the Deaf Waltham, MA 02154 Brockton, MA 02401 Route 114 Springfield, MA 01104 617-956-3801 North Andover, MA 01845
